alert.note: Alert for Burleigh; Morton; Oliver (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 8:14PM CDT until May 09 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN BURLEIGH...NORTHEASTERN MORTON AND SOUTHEASTERN OLIVER COUNTIES... At 814 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles northwest of Mandan, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. This severe storm will be near... Mandan around 820 PM CDT. Bismarck around 850 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Double Ditch Indian Village, Fort Abraham Lincoln State Park, University Of Mary, Lake Harmon, Crown Butte Lake and Baldwin. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
